attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop cutacre going ahead, there is enough polution, traffic in this area. Our lolly pop lady has just retired and they are not replacing her,will it take a death of a child from the local school to replace her.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
